text: Privacy Policy

This platform and its related companies (hereinafter referred to as "this platform", "related companies" refer to companies and institutions under the control of this platform, controlled by this platform or under the joint control of this platform.

Control refers to the promise to protect the use of the platform's products and services (hereinafter collectively referred to as the ability to be managed/operated directly or indirectly with the ability to directly or indirectly have the ability to be managed/operated by the method of actual operations, or other methods of being identified in accordance with the law.Personal information and privacy security of users (hereinafter collectively referred to as "user" or "you") of users (hereinafter collectively referred to as "user" or "you").
When you use this platform service, we may collect and use your personal information.

We hope to explain to you through the "Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy") to explain related matters such as collecting and using your relevant personal information to better protect your rights and interests.
This policy is suitable for all products and services provided by this platform.

When you use any single service, you agree to accept this policy and the protection of specific privacy information policies (hereinafter referred to as "specific terms") that we have issued in this single service.Terms also have the effect on you at the same time.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: When you use any single service, you agree to accept this policy.

text: Users under the age of fourteen, at the same time, apply this policy and "Personal Information Protection Policy" (see attachment).
If the specific terms of specific terms and the terms of the policy have inconsistent agreement, the specific terms shall be subject to specific terms within the scope of the constraints.
If a single service we provide is not applicable to this policy, the service will explicitly explicitly eliminate the applicable policy in an appropriate manner.
Please read and thoroughly understand this policy, especially the clauses that are identified by the threading line. You should focus on reading and start using it after confirmation and consent.

If you do not agree with the content of this policy, it may cause the service of this platform to fail to operate normally, or the service effect we intend to achieve cannot be achieved, and you should immediately stop accessing/using the service of this platform.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If you do not agree with the content of this policy, you should stop visiting/use this platform service immediately.

text: If you use or continue to use this platform service, you agree that you agree that we collect, use, store, share, transfer, and disclose your personal information in accordance with this policy (including updated versions).
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: By using or continuing to use the services of this platform, you agree that we will process personal information in accordance with this policy (including updated versions).

text: If you have any questions about this policy or related matters related to this policy, you can contact us through the feedback channel listed in the chapter of "How to contact us" in this policy, and we will answer you as soon as possible.

1. How do we collect and use information

In the process of using our service, we will collect and use the information provided by your service when using the service as follows, to provide you, optimize our services and ensure your account securityIn this information, including personal sensitive information, personal sensitive information refers to personal information such as leakage, illegal provision or abuse that may endanger people's body and property, and it is easy to lead to personal information such as personal reputation, physical and mental health damage or discriminatory treatment.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Personal information will be collected in the following way, including personal sensitive information.

text: Personal sensitive information involved in this privacy policy includes your personal biometric information (including facial features, voice), personal identification information (including ID information), log information, address book information, personal property information, personal common equipment information, personal common equipment information, Other information (including personal phone number, mobile phone number, whereabouts of the trajectory information, general geographical location, precise positioning information, web browsing records).
You agree to your personal sensitive information according to the purpose and method described in the "Privacy Policy":

2. How do we use cookie and similar technologies
(1) Cookie

In order to ensure the normal operation of this product, provide you with an easier access experience, and recommend content that you may be interested in, we may store a small data file named "Cookie" on your computer or mobile device.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Small data files named Cookie on your computer or mobile device.

text: Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.
With the help of cookies, websites and clients can store data such as registered accounts, mailboxes, passwords, preferences, bank accounts, network payment and/or trading accounts.
You can manage or delete according to your preferences, cookies.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can manage or delete Cookie according to your preferences.

text: You can clear all the functions saved on the computer, cookies, and most of the network browsers have the functions of stopping, cookies.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can remove all the cookies saved on the computer.

text: But if you do this, you need to change the user settings when you visit our website.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: To clear Cookie, you need to change the user settings when you visit our website.

text: To learn more about how to change the browser settings in detail, visit the related setting page of the browser you use.
(2) Website beacon and pixel label
In addition to Cookie, we may also use other similar technologies such as websites and pixel labels on the website or client.

For example, the email we send to you may contain a link to the address link to our website content. If you click the link, we will track this click to help us understand your product or service preferences to actively improve our customer service to improve customer serviceExperience.
label: Important
Risk
Usage
rewrite: Crackers of the address link to understand your product or service preference.

text: Website beacon is usually a transparent image embedded in a website or email.
With the pixel labels in emails, we can know whether the email has been opened.

If you do not want your activities to be tracked in this way, you can contact us from our letter of sending or in accordance with the contact information contained in this "Privacy Policy" at any time.
label: Edit/Control

text: (3) Do Not Track (Do not track)
Many network browsers have the Do not track function, which can release the DO Not Track request to the website.
At present, the major Internet standard organization has not yet established relevant policies to stipulate how websites should respond to such requests.
But if your browser enables Do Not Track, all our websites will respect your choices.
But please note that it may affect your experience of providing products and services with this platform.

When our products or services stop operation, we will announce notifications in accordance with relevant laws and regulations and protect your legitimate rights and interests in accordance with the law.

text: Fourth, information security protection
1. Safety protection measures
We strive to provide protection for users' information security to prevent information leakage, loss, improper use, unauthorized access and disclosure.
The technical means we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (eg, SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The technical means used include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.

text: 2. Safety event disposal measures
If personal information leaks and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent security incidents from expanding.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If personal information leaks such as personal information, emergency plans will be initiated to prevent security incidents from expanding.

text: After the security incident occurs, we will inform you the basic situation of the security incident in the form of announcement, push notification or email, we are about or already adopted, and our proposals for your response.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: After the security incident, the basic situation will be informed in the form of announcement, push notification or email.

text: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, we will issue warnings through announcement and other methods.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, the warning will be issued through the announcement.

rewrite: In the following circumstances, you can make a request to delete personal information:

text: (1) If our behavior of handling personal information violates laws and regulations;
(2) If we collect and use your personal information, it has not obtained your clear consent;
(3) If our behavior of handling personal information seriously violates your agreement;
(4) If you no longer use our products or services, or you take the initiative to cancel your account;
(5) If we will no longer provide you with products or services.

3. If we decide to respond to your deletion request, we will also notify the subject of your personal information from our personal information as much as possible at the same time, asking them to delete timely, unless the laws and regulations have other regulations, or these subjects obtain your independent authorization.
4. When you delete the information from our service, we may not immediately delete the corresponding information from the backup system, but will delete these information when the backup is updated.
(4) Change the scope of your authorization consent
Each business function requires some basic personal information to be completed (see the first of the Privacy Policy).

In addition, you can withdraw part of the authorization by dismissing binding, modifying personal settings, deleting relevant information, etc., or you can revoke partial authorization by closing the function.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Part of the authorization can be withdrawn, and part of the authorization can also be revoked by turning off the function.

text: For example, if you want to stop sharing your geographical location information when you use geographical location -related services, you can stop sharing the closing method of closing functions, software and hardware service providers and communication service providers through your mobile phone.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: It can be stopped to stop sharing through the closure of functions, software and hardware service providers and communication service providers through mobile phones.

text: When you withdraw your consent, we will no longer process the corresponding personal information.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: When you withdraw your consent, we will no longer process the corresponding personal information.

text: But your decision to recover the consent will not affect personal information processing based on your authorization.
label: Permission Acquisition
Edit/Control
Risk
Important

text: (5) List of personal information main body
1. You can be on your own, and submit your account to cancel your application on your own.
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: 2. After you actively cancel your account, we will stop providing you with products or services, delete your personal information according to the requirements of applicable laws, or make it anonymous processing.
label: Important
Data Security

text: (6) Automatic decision -making of constraint information system
In certain business functions, we may make decisions only based on the non -artificial automatic decision mechanism, including information systems, algorithms, etc..
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Decisions are made based on the non -artificial automatic decision -making mechanism, including information systems, algorithms, etc.

text: If these decisions significantly affect your legitimate rights and interests, you have the right to ask us for an explanation, and we will also provide appeal methods on the premise of not infringing on the trade secrets of this product or other user rights and social public interests.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You have the right to ask us to explain, and we will also provide an appeal method.

text: (7) Responsive your above request
1. To ensure safety, you may need to provide a written request or prove your identity in other ways.
We may ask you to verify your identity first, and then process your request.
2. We will make a reply as soon as possible.
If you are not satisfied, a complaint can be initiated through the customer service contact information stated by Article 9 of the privacy policy.
3. For your reasonable requests, we do not charge fees in principle, but we will charge a certain cost fee depending on requests that repeat and beyond the reasonable limit.
label: Edit/Control
Risk
Important
rewrite: In principle, no fee is charged, but for repeated requests that exceed reasonable limits, a certain cost will be charged depending on the situation.

text: For those unprocessed, too many technical means (for example, need to develop new systems or fundamentally change the current practice), bring risks or very unrealistic requests to the legitimate rights and interests of others, we may refuse.

Risk

text: 4. In the following circumstances, in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, we will not be able to respond to your request:
label: Edit/Control

text: (2), related to public safety, public health, and major public interests;

text: (3), related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial, and execution judgment;

Risk

text: (4) There are sufficient evidence that the subject of personal information has subjective malicious or abuse of rights;

text: (5) In response to your request, the legitimate rights and interests of you or other individuals and organizations are severely damaged;

text: (6), involved business secrets.

text: Seven, change
We may revise this agreement in a timely manner.
When the terms of this agreement change, we will prompt you the change of the agreement in an appropriate manner when the version is updated.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: When the version is updated, it will prompt you to change the agreement in an appropriate manner.

text: Please read the privacy protection protocol after the change. You continue to use our game to indicate that you agree to collect, process or use your personal information according to the updated privacy protection agreement.
label: Policy Change
Important

text: 8. Protection of minors
We attach great importance to the protection of minors' personal information.
We will actively protect the legitimate rights and interests of minors by enabling the anti -addiction system in accordance with the requirements of national defense addiction policies.

If you are under the age of 16, please read the privacy protection agreement with your guardian (legal agent) before using the services we provided for you and obtain your guardian (Agreement of legal agent).
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minors under the age of 16 must read the privacy protection agreement with the guardian (legal agent) and obtain the consent of the guardian (legal agent).
